Class ContainerPerClassTestNgStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.glassfish.jersey.test.ContainerPerClassTestNgStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestNgStrategy

    public class ContainerPerClassTestNgStrategy
extends Object
implements TestNgStrategy
    TestNG strategy that creates one test container / client per test class.
    Author:
    Michal Gajdos
